message.body: (01/02) Mattie I've been trying so fucking hard to not contact you, as per your request . I saw a terrific play tonight, which of course reminded me of you. Sen
(02/02) ding you happy thoughts and sincerely hoping you're finding the fulfillment and focus that you needed.
Thank you, tim. What play was it?
(01/02) Mmmm, you know how I feel about "tim". So formal. The play was for colored girls who have considered suicide when the rainbow is enough. Heard of it? Ap
(02/02) parently it's famous. Wasn't really physical theatre (theater) but did have lots of moving and not a traditional plot. So Tyler would have liked it.
You would've liked it too. Very feminist.
The name stuff is going to have to settle, let's not talk about it anymore please. I haven't heard of the play but it sounds great.
